title: Customized Online Job Competency Enhancement Course (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and understanding of job-related foundational concepts
context.additional_context: Blended course offering learner-tailored content and flexible learning pathways to address low participation rates in online vocational training; aims to strengthen university students' employment competencies

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three core job-related competencies through customized learning path design.
Learners improve self-directed learning abilities by completing over 80% of customized materials (text/video/quizzes) provided on the online platform.
Learners achieve 75+ points in job-performance simulation tasks by utilizing a feedback system (automated scoring/peer evaluation/instructor comments).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
